lead_paragraph: Lawmakers in both parties are calling on the administration to rethink its approach to shuttering the detention center at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba.

snippet: Lawmakers in both parties are calling on the administration to rethink its approach to shuttering the detention center at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba.

headline.main: Terror Attempt May Hinder Plans to Close Guantánamo
headline.print_headline: Terror Attempt May Hinder Plans to Close Guantánamo

byline.original: By PETER BAKER  and CHARLIE SAVAGE
byline.contributor: Peter Baker reported from Kaneohe, and Charlie Savage from Washington. Eric Lipton contributed reporting from Washington.
